text:
Hi @_buildspace fam, got any recommendations for a newsletter services that has monetisation/payment options for users in the Indian subcontinent.

I was trying to connect by Substack account to a pre-existing @stripe account to only realise that it has been permanently deactivated. A new stripe account is also a no-go as stripe has made it an invite-only thing for Indian users. So I cannot depend on any newsletter service provider that depends on stripe as the payment gateway.

So any suggestions, ideas on how to get over this debacle?

Cc @_nightsweekends @FarzaTV 

#stripealternative #newsletter

user_info.name: Rahul Rajeev
